## Monitoring plant diseases

Remote sensing of diseases under production conditions is challenging because of variable environmental factors and crop-intrinsic characteristics, e.g., 3D architecture, various growth stages, variety of diseases that may occur simultaneously, and the high sensitivity required to reliably perceive low disease levels suitable for decision-making in disease control.
